text: Repression may mean * Memory inhibition, the ability to shut out memories * Political repression, the oppression or persecution of an individual or group for political reasons * Psychological repression - excluding desires and impulses from one's consciousness * Social repression, the socially supported mistreatment and exploitation of a group of people * Genetic repression, the down-regulation of gene transcription by the action of repressor proteins binding to a promoter * "Repression" (Star Trek: Voyager), an episode of the science fiction television series Star Trek: Voyager, the fourth episode of the seventh (and final) season of the series
title: Repression
